mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ta_task tt WHERE tt.state = 1 AND tt.type = #{type} AND tt.start_time < now() AND tt.end_time > NOW() AND (tt.is_user = 1 OR (tt.is_user = 0 and (select count(1) from ta_task_to_user ttou where ttou.user_id = #{uid} AND ttou.task_id = tt.id)>0)) AND (tt.is_level = 1 OR (tt.is_level = 0 and (select count(1) from ta_task_to_level ttol where ttol.`level` = #{levels} AND ttol.task_id = tt.id)>0)) ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(tt.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') DESC, tt.price DESC LIMIT #{pagenum}, #{pagesize}
